BDR.Description: BDR measurement switcher, if checkbox is enabled, measurement will be performed or not

EDR.Description: EDR measurement switcher, if checkbox is enabled, measurement will be performed or not

BLE5.0.Description: BLE 5.0 measurement switcher, if checkbox is enabled, measurement will be performed or not

PacketType.Description: Different packet type with differrent packet length, the matching map is DH1,DH3,DH5

RxCount.Description: Total bits count for RX configuration!

RXMinLvl.Description: Rx min level for per probe meas. Unit:dBm

RXMaxLvl.Description: Rx max level for per probe meas. Unit:dBm

Specification.Description: Configure the test tolerance and specification

PacketType.Description: Different packet type with different packet length, the matching map is 2-DH1,2-DH3,2-DH5,3-DH1,3-DH3,3-DH5

RXMaxLvl.Description: Rx max level for per probe meas. Unit:dBm
